Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class World

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.World
public class World extends Object
This class contains the model for all the game board settings.
Its class name is world, it separates the scene part from its previous class "GameBoard". Note: Each world have levels set and the current level set
It has defined ball setting, paddle setting unchanged during the playing process, also the background setting,life setting.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN

  • Constructor Details

    • World

      World()
      This constructor sets the basic setting for the ball,wall and score. It also initializes the sound for the breaking brick.
